welcome.searchHint: Type a name and press enter or click search.

discover.title: Discover Figures
discover.description: Search or browse through profiles of public figures from various fields.

express.title: Express Your Perception
express.description: Vote for the emotion a figure provokes in you and see the global results.

discuss.title: Join the Discussions
discuss.description: Share your opinions in the comment sections and react to others.

share.title: Share Profiles
share.description: Easily share profiles with your friends on social media.

betaAlert.title: Beta Version
betaAlert.description: Our platform is currently in active development. We appreciate your patience and feedback as we work to improve the experience.
